alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 11 at 3:08PM PST until February 13 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 24 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally larger amounts of snow are expected under a convergence zone that will likely develop on Monday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
